headlines.headline: Stephen A. isn't confident Jaylen Brown can get the Celtics past the Pistons
headlines.description: Stephen A. Smith explains why the Pistons might be too much of a hurdle for Jaylen Brown and the Celtics.

headlines.headline: USA Basketball's road to 2028: New era, new coach, new decisions
headlines.description: With Los Angeles 2028 up next on the Olympic calendar, what lies ahead for USA Basketball?

headlines.headline: How far can the 76ers go without Embiid?
headlines.description: Kendrick Perkins and Brian Windhorst discuss whether the 76ers can make a deep playoff run with Joel Embiid's injury issues.

headlines.headline: Why Jaylen Brown is Perk's MVP front-runner
headlines.description: Kendrick Perkins discusses why Jaylen Brown needs to be taken seriously as an MVP candidate this season.

headlines.headline: Predicting the 2028 USA Olympic basketball roster: Top 12 players
headlines.description: In a time of transition for USA basketball, here's what the 12-man squad that will go up against a competitive international slate could look like.

headlines.headline: Clingan scores 23 points to lead Trail Blazers past short-handed Suns 92-77
headlines.description: â€” Donovan Clingan had 23 points, 13 rebounds and four blocked shots to lead the Portland Trail Blazers past the short-handed Phoenix Suns, 92-77 on Sunday night.

headlines.headline: The challenge Dan Graziano sees in the Lions trading for Myles Garrett
headlines.description: Dan Graziano, Mike Tannenbaum and Jason McCourty debate whether the Browns and Lions could link up on a Myles Garrett trade.

headlines.headline: Why Randy Orton wants to RKO Tom Brady
headlines.description: Ahead of WWE Elimination Chamber, Randy Orton expresses his desire to win another world title and to deliver his RKO finisher to Tom Brady.

headlines.headline: Is Fernando Mendoza not throwing at combine a big deal?
headlines.description: Mike Tannenbaum and Dan Graziano examine Fernando Mendoza's potential combine week after his decision not to throw there.

headlines.headline: Why the tush push is not expected to be banned
headlines.description: Dan Graziano and Jason McCourty weigh in on why the NFL competition committee is not expecting a tush push ban proposal this year.

headlines.headline: 2026 NFL free agency: Best players available on offense
headlines.description: NFL free agency is almost here, and we placed players on offense into tiers based on their potential offseason contracts. Who could get paid?

headlines.headline: Four key positions the Titans should address this offseason
headlines.description: Wide receiver and cornerback are among the positions of need for Tennessee.

headlines.headline: Olympics 2026: Standouts, disappointments from all 32 NHL teams
headlines.description: It was an honor for every player to skate for their country. Some will come home happy, while others will be frustrated.

headlines.headline: USA-Canada gold medal game: Top photos from an Olympic instant classic
headlines.description: From Boldy's opener to Hughes' finish, the top photos capture every swing of a dramatic final.

headlines.headline: Team USA brings Johnny Gaudreau's kids to ice for Olympic moment
headlines.description: After winning the gold in men's hockey, Team USA skated with the No. 13 jersey of the late Johnny Gaudreau before bringing his kids to the ice for a golden moment.

headlines.headline: Who makes Team USA in men's hockey at the 2030 Olympics?
headlines.description: While the 2026 roster returns home with medals, here's who could represent the U.S. in the French Alps Games.

headlines.headline: How Team USA won a thrilling gold medal game against Canada
headlines.description: Jack Hughes' goal in overtime sealed the victory. Here's what swung the game for both teams.

headlines.headline: 'LEGENDS': Tom Brady, Devin Booker lead reaction to USA men's hockey gold
headlines.description: Team USA men's ice hockey brought home the gold for the first time since the Miracle on Ice in 1980 -- and the sports world celebrated.
